titlestmt.titleproper: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, Commissions and Special Task Forces, RG 6
A Guide to the John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, Commissions and Special Task Forces, RG 6 FA1800

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2025-01-01 05:04:26 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, Commissions and Special Task Forces, RG 6

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Material less than 10 years old is restricted.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Knight Foundation has title, copyright and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them.

The Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish material from the collection. Permission to publish extensive excerpts, or material in its entirety, will be referred to the Knight Foundation.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Record Group 6 contains information on the Commission of Intercollegiate Athletics and the Knight Commission on Information Needs of Communities in a Democracy.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Record Group 6 is divided into 2 series:
Series 1: Knight Commission on Intercollegiate Athletics
Series 2: Knight Commission on Information Needs of Communities in a Democracy
